start: ^(As you walk, you notice a weird person carrying a sign with the words 'We sell candy'.)
^(He seems to notice you, because he turns his head and smiles at you.)
yes: ^Great! Come buy some from us. You'll find our candy to be very stress-relieving.
no: ^That's sad. But go ahead and try buying from us anyways. You'll find our candy to be very stress-relieving.
ignore: ^(You pretend you didn't notice and leave quietly.)
